snippet: With their own history of facing religious bias, Mormons in reliably Republican Utah are worried about whether to support a nominee who denigrates Muslims....
abstract: Donald Trump's statements on many topics, including his call for ban on Muslims, have Mormons agonizing over how to cast their ballot in upcoming presidential elections; Hillary Clinton's campaign seeks to capitalize on growing ambivalence of Republican-leaning Utah voters and will seek to turn red state blue.
lead_paragraph: With their own history of facing religious bias, Mormons in reliably Republican Utah are worried about whether to support a nominee who denigrates Muslims.

headline.main: Mormons’ Distaste for Donald Trump Puts Utah Up for Grabs
headline.print_headline: Mormon Distaste for Trump Puts Utah in Play

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
